welcome.title: Welcome to Parrot
welcome.subtitle: Your AI Programming Assistant

description.part1: Unlock the intelligent coding capabilities of
description.part2: along with access to tools that let me complete all sorts of tasks, including creating and editing files, exploring complex projects, using a browser, and executing terminal commands
description.part3: I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my abilities.

welcome.signupPrompt: Sign up for an account to get started free, or use an API key with access to models like Claude Sonnet.

homeHeader.title: What can I do for you?
homeHeader.tooltip: I can progressively develop software by editing files, exploring projects, running commands, and using a browser. I can even use MCP tools to extend beyond basic code completion to help.
